trans-unit.source: Represents a control that provides a divider and optional label between elements in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> menu or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the text that is displayed with the visual separator line.

You can set the optional <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator.Label%2A> property to display text along with the visual separator line that is displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The text that is displayed with the visual separator line.
The registered default is `null`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator.Label"></xref> dependency property.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSeparatorAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator"></xref> has been updated.
The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
Invoked when the parent of this element in the visual tree is changed.
Old parent or `null` if the element in the visual tree did not have a parent before.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
The registered default is `null`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Ribbon"></xref> dependency property.
